CustomField.description: Enter customer name as free-form text, when Exhibitor/Customer is not available in Salesforce. Field defaulted with same value as the Account Name field, unless Account Name is a generic exhibitor. In which case, this field is required.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defaulted with value from Account Name field, for actual exhibitors. For generic customer records (Exhibitor and Non-Exhibitor), value needs to be entered manually.
CustomField.label: Customer Name
